title: i have been haked
body: help me pls i have been haked by someone and i can't rejoin my other acount (my other acount is )****

replies.body:
No worries, I can lock the account for you to prevent anymore unauthorized access.  Reach out to our account team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we'll help update your info.

Galacius beat me to it, thanks buddy!

> [{quoted}](name=legionrobin,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NjwF2gnJ,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-01-11T23:59:50.562+0000)
>
> help me pls i have been haked by someone and i can&#039;t rejoin my other acount (my other acount is <Mod Edit>)****

I edited out your personal information (account name) from your post. In these circumstances, you need to follow the [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) FAQ. They will place a security lock on your account until the original owner can be verified. This may take a few days depending on ticket volume, but rest assured they will take care of it. 

Good luck!
